def Load(widget): import clr from Benner.Tecnologia.Business import Query clr.AddReference("Benner.ERP.Comum") from Benner.ERP.Comum import Utils
qRegistros = Query("SELECT * FROM GN_POLITICASTERMOUSO").Execute()
widget.View.Commands["New"].Visible = (qRegistros.Count == 0)
